title: Voters Reject Election Deniers Running to Take Over Elections
description: With Jim Marchant’s defeat by Cisco Aguilar in Nevada’s secretary of state race, all but one of the “America First” slate of candidates who espoused conspiracy theories about the 2020 election were defeated.
dc:creator: Nick Corasaniti

media:content.media:credit: Bridget Bennett for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Cisco Aguilar, the Democratic nominee for secretary of state in Nevada, at an event this month. “People are tired of chaos,” he said in an interview.
